#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int a,b,c;
	cin>>a>>b>>c;
	while(a!=0||b!=0||c!=0)
	{	int g1,g2;
		if(b>a)
		{	
			if((b-a)==(c-b))
			cout<<"AP "<<c+b-a<<"\n";
			else if((b%a==0)&&(c%b==0))
			{	int r1,r2;
				r1=b/a;
				r2=c/b;
				if(r1==r2)
				cout<<"GP "<<c*r2<<"\n";
				
			}
		}
		else if(b<a)
		{
			if((a-b)==(b-c))
			cout<<"AP "<<c-(a-b)<<"\n";
			else if((a%b==0)&&(b%c==0))
			{	
				
				g1=a/b;
				g2=b/c;
				if(g1==g2)
				cout<<"GP "<<c/g1<<"\n";
			}
		}
		
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
	}
}
